entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
